title: No Remorse
description: Lee McCloud (Mac) has a reputation as a loose cannon, so when a secretive government agency recruits him team leader Tally is told to keep him on a tight leash. But Mac has other ideas, and when a close friend’s daughter is kidnapped he follows the trail, fighting obstacles at every turn. With time running out he and Tally discover there’s much more at stake than saving Sophia…Kirkus Reviews "Walkley’s beefy prose and rousing action sequences deliver a thriller to satisfy any adrenaline addict."“First-time author Ian Walkley gets everything right in NO REMORSE, a gritty, complicated thriller. Walkley's story bursts off the page with intense action, exotic locales and authentic details, while realistic characters navigate a web of intrigue and deceit worthy of Clancy or Ludlum at their best. A gripping, heart-stopping thriller. Walkley is definitely an author to watch!” Karen Dionne, author, THE MARSH KING“Exotic locations, intricate plot, well-developed characters. More thrills than climbing the Matterhorn.” DL Wilson, author, SIROCCO, UNHOLY GRAIL“An edgy thriller that gets straight into the action and doesn't let up. A plausible plot with a strong and engaging protagonist.” JJ Cooper, author THE INTERROGATOR, DEADLY TRUST
author: Ian Walkley
